data.title: Telugu Cinema Gallery
data.meta_description: Watch free online Telugu movies, Telugu movies review, Telugu movie gossips, Telugu cinema gallery, , trailers, Wallpapers, videos, Telugu cinema events and download free Telugu movies.
data.text:
Shruti Hassan out of Iddaru Ammayilu

Actress Shruti Hassan who is flooded with offers post the success of ‘Gabbar Singh’ has reportedly opted out of Stylish Star Allu Arjun’s new movie ‘Iddaru Ammayilu’. Shruti Hassan has recently signed Prabhu Deva’s Hindi remake of Telugu film ‘Nuvvu Vasthanante Nenu Vaddantana (NVNV)’ which requires bulk

Chiranjeevi Title for Allari Naresh

Allari Naresh who earlier danced for the hit songs of Mega Star Chiranjeevi in his movies is keen to name his film after Chiranjeevi’s super hit movie, says sources. Reportedly, Allari Naresh’s new movie which is set under Yamalokam backdrop is likely to be titled ‘Yamudiki Modudu’. Released in 1988, Chiranjeevi’s

Pawan Kalyan CMGR Release Date Advanced

Cameraman Ganga Tho Rambabu (CMGR) Release Date: Power Star Pawan Kalyan’s ‘Cameraman Ganga Tho Rambabu (CGTR)' movie release date is likely to be advanced by a week, says the buzz. The makers of ‘CGTR’ are planning to release the movie on October 11 instead of earlier announced date

Nagarjuna Love Story Satellite Rights

As per the buzz, King Nagarjuna’s new movie ‘Love Story’ satellite rights were snapped by Zee Telugu for 3.5 crores. The movie is still under production and recently few key scenes of the film were shot on Nagarjuna

NTR To Attend Srimanarayana Audio Event

Right from some time, speculations were going on that there is a riff between Nandamuri Balakrishna and Jr NTR. Both Balakrishna and Jr NTR have rubbished these as rumors. Buzz says, Jr NTR will be attending the audio release function of Balakrishna starer 'Srimannarayana' on August 6 in Novotel Hotel, Hyderabad. Though

Manisha Koirala Ends Her Marriage

Did Manisha Koirala ended up her marriage? Yes says the buzz. Manisha Koirala was has married a Nepali businessman Samrat Dahal two years back in a big fat wedding. Nothing seems to be good between the couple and Manisha Koirala used to post in social networking sites that Samrat Dahal is her worst enemy.

Allari Naresh Satire on Mahesh Dookudu

Comedy hero Allari Naresh who is quite popular for doing spoof comedies in his films has now acted in a full length spoof comedy movie titled ‘Sudigadu’. The movie which is the remake of ‘Tamizh Padam’ has spoofs on popular movies like ‘Gabbar Singh’, ‘Dookudu’, ‘Eega’, etc. The teaser trailer of Sudigadu

NTR Brindavanam Remake in Hindi

Brindavanam Movie Remake: Young Tiger NTR’s super hit movie ‘Brindavanam’ produced by Dil Raju goes Bollywood. Sources say that Dil Raju has sold the Hindi remake rights of the movie to a popular production house for a whopping price. Ranbhir Kapoor is likely to reprise the role of Jr NTR, while Sanjay Dutt would

Prabhas Rebel Release in September

Young Rebel Star Prabhas's upcoming movie 'Rebel' shooting is almost completed except a song. Makers of the movie are planning to complete the entire shooting by the first week of August and planning to release the film in the month of September. Tamanna and Deeksha Seth have been paired as heroines opposite to

Andrea Replaces Aksha in Vettai Remake

Play back singer and actress Andrea Jeremiah has been roped in as the female lead in the Telugu remake of 'Vettai' movie. Naga Chaitanya and Sunil will be seen as brothers in this untitled film. Initially, Aksha was supposed to star opposite to Sunil, but the reports say that Andrea has replaced her in the film. Hansika will

Gundello Godari Trailer in UKUP Theater

Gundello Godari Teaser Trailer: Versatile actress Manchu Lakshmi and Tapsee starrer ‘Gundello Godari’ movie teaser trailer would be screened in all the Uu Kodathara Ulikki Padahara (UKUP)’ theaters from July 27. It is learnt that the makers of ‘Gundello Godari’ movie are working hard to dispatch Gundello Godari trailer along

Tapsee in Allu Arjun Iddaru Ammayilu

Actress Tapsee Pannu is likely to share screen space with Allu Arjun as female lead in his new movie tentatively titled 'Iddaru Ammayilu'. Recently, the makers of the film have approached Tapsee for the heroine's role and are awaiting for the confirmation from the beautiful actress. Our sources say that Tapsee is very

Mahesh Babu Daughter Name

Super Star Mahesh Babu's daughter who was born this morning in Hyderabad has been named as 'Sitara', says the buzz. Though, there is no formal announcement from Mahesh Babu or his family members on the same, filmnagar sources says that Mahesh Babu and Namrata's baby girl's name is 'Sitara'. We have to wait

Chiranjeevi Indra to be Remade in Hindi

Is Mega Star Chiranjeevi starer 'Indra' going to be remade in Hindi? Yes says the buzz. Noted film maker Sanjay Leela Bhansali, who has recently produced 'Rowdy Rathore' is considering to remake 'Indra' movie which was a blockbuster hit in Telugu. Chiranjeevi's power role as Indra Sena Reddy not only won him the
